name: R
description:
### Description

This components allows to write code in R and run it directly in LOKO AI. 

If yo have any file that you want to use, add it to the volume folder, where the default path is: 


```/var/opt/loko/projects/r/data```

To read or write file, the reference path to use in the code is ```plugin/data```. 

To install new packages you can either do it by code, with the classical R sintax ```install.packages('package_name')```, or by adding it to the r_requirementes.txt file that you can find in the path ```/home/$USER/loko/shared/extensions/r-extension/```
